name: The Ultimate The Hot Chick Quiz |    Movies

questions.text: Which town is "The Hot Chick" set in?
questions.explanation:
Bridgetown.

	The movie is set in 2003 in Bridgetown.  This is where the magical earrings from Abysinnia in 50 B.C. eventually end up.  The town's high school team is known as the Honeybees/Honeys, and Jessica and her friends are all cheerleaders.  Bridgetown is in California.

questions.text: The vice principal of Jessica's high school played which instrument in band?
questions.explanation:
Tuba.

	Jessica uses this fact, as Clive, to get the job as school janitor.  He makes it seem like he's a band geek like the vice principal, in order to win her over.

questions.text: Who is Jessica's boyfriend in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Billy.

	Billy wants Jessica to go snowboarding with him, but she doesn't want to.  He eventually sees her again but "Clive" is in her body, and he steals Billy's car.

questions.text: What state did April move from?
questions.explanation:
Arkansas.

	When April moved to Bridgetown in second grade, most kids threw rocks at her because she talked funny.  Jessica and April became friends shortly after.

questions.text: The name of Jessica's dad in the movie is Paul.
questions.explanation:
False.

	When Jessica returns to her house, her dad mistakes her for the new gardener.  Her dad's real name is Richie.

questions.text: What colour is Jessica's car in the movie?
questions.explanation:
Yellow.

	Jessica owns a yellow Volkswagen Beetle, although she says it'd be much better if it were red.  Her licence plate is HOTCHK1.

questions.text: What is the name of the club that Jessica and her friends go to, to find out if Bianca has a tattoo on her back?
questions.explanation:
Instant Tang.

	Instant Tang is a club that Jessica's arch-nemesis Bianca hangs out at.  They try to find out if Bianca has a scorpion tattoo on her back.

questions.text: What is the name of the robber who Jessica traded bodies with, thus making him "The Hot Chick"?
questions.explanation:
Clive.

	Clive is played by Rob Schnieder.  Clive found the second earring when it dropped out of Jessica's car at a gas station he robbed.  Both of them switched bodies during the night.

questions.text: What is one thing the robber does not do when he is "The Hot Chick" in Jessica's body?
questions.explanation:
Meet Jessica's parents.

	Jessica's parents never know the full truth about her switching bodies.  Clive steals, beats up men and steals money from them, and becomes a stripper at "The Pole Cat Club" before his body is returned.

questions.text: In how many different locations do we see Adam Sandler's character in the movie?
questions.explanation:
2.

	We see him in "The Pole Cat Club", and at "Mambuza", where he is employed.  Thanks for playing the quiz!
